Maha Vajiralongkorn is the King of Thailand.

Maha Vajiralongkorn was born in Bangkok, Thailand, as the second of four children of King Bhumibol Adulyadej and Queen Sirikit. His full name at birth was Maha Vajiralongkorn Bodindradebayavarangkun.
